de.upb.pcm.pms

Interface MeasurementSpecification

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject, org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.Notifier, UniqueElement
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MeasurementSpecificationImpl

    public interface MeasurementSpecification
extends UniqueElement
    A representation of the model object 'Measurement Specification'. A measurement specification for a pcm element including the performance metric and the statistical charaterization.

    The following features are supported:

    • Temporal Restriction
    • Performance Metric
    • Statistical Characterization

    See Also:
    PmsPackage.getMeasurementSpecification()
